charges.charge_description: UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. Defendant having been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, knowingly did possess in and affecting commerce, a firearm, that is, a Taurus, Model PT-99AF, 9mm pistol, and 9mm ammmunition, all of which had been shipped and transported in interstate and foreign commerce; all in violation of Title 18, USC, Sections 922(g)(1), 924(a)(2), and 924(e).

NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE knowingly, unlawfully, and intentionally did possess with intent to distribute five (5) grams or more of cocaine base (commonly known as &;quot;crack&;quot; cocaine), and a quantity of cocaine, both Schedule II controlled substances, and a quantity of marijuana, a Schedule I controlled substance, in violation of Title 21, USC Sections 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B), 841(b)(1)(C) and 841(b)(1)(D).

VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN knowingly used and carried a firearm during and in relation to, and possessed a firearm in furtherance of, a drug trafficking crime, in violation of Title 18, USC, Section 924(c)(1)(A)(i).
